Elements.description:
#()
Output the result of an expression

Elements.name: #bind
Elements.description:
#bind(expression)
Makes the given expression the current scope

Elements.name: #copyof
Elements.description:
#copyof(expression)
Outputs a copy of the given expression

Elements.name: #else
Elements.description:
#else
Outputs the block only if the previous #if and any #elseif's evaluate to false

Elements.name: #elseif
Elements.description:
#elseif(expression)
Outputs the block only if the previous #if and any #elseif's evaluate to false and the given expression evaluates to true

Elements.name: #function
Elements.description:
#function(funcName)
Creates a function that can be called from any expression

Elements.name: #if
Elements.description:
#if(expression)
Outputs the block only if the given expression evaluates to true

Elements.name: #include
Elements.description:
#include
Includes the contents of an external file

Elements.name: #message
Elements.description:
#message
Outputs a message to the console

Elements.name: #template
Elements.description:
#template(templateName, [[paramNames]])
Creates a template that can be called from other JTran code

Elements.name: #variable
Elements.description:
#variable(varName)
Creates a variable for use in expressions
